Introduction
This topic contains guidance on open-ended hospitalization ratings under 38 CFR 4.29, including
preparing an open-ended hospitalization rating decision
follow-up on open-ended hospitalization evaluations
, and
discontinuance of open-ended hospitalization evaluations
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B - Hospitalization Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.29
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section B
